translation.en: [deputy] Pardon me. Excuse me. Step aside please.
translation.ja: 通るよ　通してくれ

translation.en: Lee's Diner. I got four down. I need two EMS vehicles.
translation.ja: リーの店の前に救急車を２台

translation.en: What the hell happened here? Somebody run them over?
translation.ja: どうした　ひき逃げか？

translation.en: No, man, it was a fight.
One guy took them all out in like seconds.
translation.ja: アッと言う間に１人で倒した

translation.en: [deputy] Turn around, mister. Let me see your hands.
translation.ja: 手を上げて こっちを向け
陸軍のＩＤだ　失効してる

translation.en: Aggravated assault is a second-degree felony in this state, Mister...
translation.ja: 第２級の暴行罪だな ミスター…

translation.en: Reacher. First name Jack. No middle name.
translation.ja: リーチャー ファーストネームはジャック

translation.en: You're looking at 10 to 20 years once those boys you beat out there are fit to testify.
translation.ja: 被害者が回復して証言すりゃ 懲役10～20年だ

translation.en: Process him. Get him to County.
Two things are gonna happen in the next 90 seconds.
First, that phone over there is gonna ring.
translation.ja: まず あそこの電話が鳴る

translation.en: You're gonna be wearing these cuffs on your way to prison.
translation.ja: お前が手錠姿でブチ込まれる

translation.en: Well, that is one magnificent prophecy, Mr. Reacher.
translation.ja: 突拍子もない予言だな ミスター･リーチャー

translation.en: of the 110th C.I.D. Military Police in Alexandria, Virginia.
translation.ja: 犯罪捜査部の ターナー少佐からだよ

translation.en: You and those boys out there made a mistake operating on land owned by the U.S. Army.
translation.ja: あんたと表の４人は 軍の敷地内で犯罪行為をした

translation.en: MPs are on their way now.
If it were up to me, I'd just kill you.
translation.ja: 俺が お前を殺したい

translation.en: It's just gonna keep on ringing.
The guy you didn't count on.

translation.ja: 第110憲兵隊　リーチ軍曹

translation.en: [Turner] This is she. Who am I speaking to?
translation.ja: そうです　そちらは？

translation.en: [chuckles] No kidding. Well, it's nice to finally speak.
translation.ja: 驚いた やっと声を聞けたわ

translation.en: Thanks for tipping us off to that Sheriff.
translation.ja: 保安官の情報を どうも

translation.en: I wanted to thank you for helping me out of a tight spot.
translation.ja: この前 ピンチから 救ってくれた礼だ

translation.en: Isn't that what Army folks do for each other, Major?
translation.ja: 軍人同士ですもの　少佐

translation.en: Oh, once a Major, always a Major.
translation.ja: 少佐は 永久に少佐よ

translation.en: It doesn't really matter. I move around a lot.
-So I've heard. -What else have you heard?
Oh, come on. You're a legend around here.
translation.ja: あなたは我々のレジェンドよ

translation.en: Some folks still wonder why you left.
Let's just say I woke up one morning and the uniform didn't fit.
translation.ja: ある朝起きたら 軍服が 体に合わなくなってた
第110憲兵隊　リーチ軍曹

translation.en: I'm sitting here now. Uh, there is this big dent in the desk.
translation.ja: あなたのデスクよ 表面に へこみがあるのは⸺

translation.en: And people say you made it with someone's head.
[Turner] You're not in trouble again, are you?
I've heard you have a way of finding it.

translation.ja: 自分から トラブルを探すの？

translation.en: [Reacher] Yeah, I was thinking maybe I owe you dinner for what you did.
translation.ja: あの時の礼に 食事をおごろうかと

translation.en: Oh, well, it took you a while to come to that conclusion.
translation.ja: 今になって やっと誘うの？

translation.en: When are you coming to D.C.?
[stutters] Well, then I won't hold my breath.
translation.ja: あてにせず 待つわ

translation.en: I'm deciding whether I'd like you in person.
translation.ja: 会って好きになれるかと

translation.en: Not sure you could handle me.

translation.ja: 覚悟しといて いいわね
“ワシントンＤＣ行き” 気をつけて
リーチャーだ ターナー少佐を

translation.en: Major Reacher. Sergeant Leach. We've spoken on the phone.
translation.ja: 電話に出た リーチ軍曹です

translation.en: Just Reacher. I'm a civilian now.
translation.ja: 民間人だから “リーチャー”だ

translation.en: Yes, sir. I'll take you up.
Sam Morgan. Please, come in. Come in.
translation.ja: モーガン大佐だ　入ってくれ

translation.en: Just stopping by to see Major Turner.
Major Turner's been relieved of her command.
I spoke with her a few days ago.
I'm assuming her duties until a replacement is assigned.
Something I can help you with?
You know each other from back when you were C.O. here?
I'm sorry to give you the bad news, Major.
[Leach] Sir, I wanted to warn you.
-[Reacher] But? -Ordered not to. [Leach] Colonel Morgan directly.
translation.ja: モーガン大佐の指示です

translation.en: Maybe you should warn me now.
Major Turner is an excellent officer, sir.
translation.ja: ターナー少佐は優秀な方です

translation.en: Has she been assigned an attorney yet?
Ordered not to give out any information about that, sir.

translation.ja: これからも命令どおりに

translation.en: Just curious. Who was your D.I. in boot camp?
translation.ja: 訓練基地での君の教官は？

translation.en: Now, say if Sergeant Greene were having legal troubles,
would you be able to recommend an attorney for him?
Oh. Yes. Definitely. I'd recommend Colonel Moorcroft over at Fort Dyer
translation.ja: 私なら軍の重警備刑務所がある ダイヤー基地の⸺

translation.en: where the high-security prisoners are confined, sir.
translation.ja: モアクロフト大佐に頼みます

translation.en: You're the assigned counsel for Major Susan Turner.
translation.ja: スーザン･ターナー少佐の 弁護を？

translation.en: I'm Jack Reacher, former commander of the 110th.
translation.ja: 元憲兵隊指揮官の リーチャーです

translation.en: I was wondering when you were gonna show up.
Major Turner requested under no circumstances are you to be granted visitation privileges.
translation.ja: ターナー少佐は 君に面会許可を与えるなと

translation.en: -Why would she say that? -Maybe she read your file.
translation.ja: 理由は？ 君の履歴だ

translation.en: It says here you never paid child support.
Well, a woman named Candace Dutton begs to differ.
translation.ja: キャンデス･ダトンという 女性の言い分は違う

translation.en: She contacted the Army seeking compensation
translation.ja: 軍に支払いを求めてる

translation.en: for her daughter, Samantha Dutton. She's 15 now.
translation.ja: 15歳のサマンサという娘の 養育費だ

translation.en: Mother's got two priors... Prostitution. Possession.
translation.ja: 母親には売春と 薬物所持の逮捕歴

translation.en: The kid's been in and out of foster care her whole life.
translation.ja: 娘は里親の間を たらい回し
どう思う？ つらいのが人生です

translation.en: I don't have a kid. I've never heard of Candace Dutton. I'm here about Major Turner.
translation.ja: 子供はおらず 女の名も初耳 それより少佐です

translation.en: A hard drive containing classified information found in Major Turner's residence.
translation.ja: 自宅から極秘情報を収めた ハードドライブを没収した

translation.en: The inference being she's selling secrets.
What do you want, a picture of her wearing a burka having drinks with the Taliban?
translation.ja: タリバンとの写真が 必要かね？

translation.en: Can't talk to her until tomorrow.
Where'd you get your law degree?
It's possible you were once a good lawyer, Colonel.
translation.ja: 敏腕で鳴らした弁護官も⸺

translation.en: is a tired lifer who'll do anything not to endanger his pension.
translation.ja: 年金待ちの ただの年寄り

translation.en: Let me know when you remember what that uniform stands for.
How long are we supposed to do this? I'm getting hungry.
translation.ja: こんな仕事… 腹ペコだ

translation.en: [Buzzcut] What do you think he's eating?
Oh, it's nice. It makes your hands look big.
translation.ja: いいね　手がデカく見える

translation.en: -Yeah, you like big hands? -[chuckles] Put one of these in your face in a minute, you carry on.
translation.ja: そう アレもデカいぞ お前の好みだろ？

translation.en: Hey. Hey, hey! Where'd he go?
I don't know. Maybe went to the pisser.
You're supposed to be watching him.
What do you think I got, eyes in the back of me head?
You know a lot of narcs?
Well, thanks. I did it myself.
So, you're looking for something weird.
Well, she's not into doing that kind of thing anymore.
translation.ja: ママ　客商売はやめたよ

translation.en: If you're looking for my mom, I don't live with her.
Two weeks ago, Major Turner dispatches them to Afghanistan on an investigation.
translation.ja: 調査目的でチベッリと ミルコビッチ２軍曹を⸺

translation.en: Two days ago, they're both found dead near Bagram Air Base. Shot at close range.
translation.ja: だが２人はアフガン基地で 射殺体で発見された

translation.en: And the next day, Major Turner's thrown in prison.
translation.ja: ターナーの逮捕は翌日だ

translation.en: What do you know about Parasource?
It's a big military contractor. Why?
translation.ja: 大手の軍事請負会社だ

translation.en: I don't know how they're involved in all this, but they've been following me since I got here.
translation.ja: その手先が 俺を尾けてるんです

translation.en: Whoever killed Mirkovich and Cibelli wanted Major Turner isolated.
translation.ja: ２人の軍曹を殺したのは奴らで ターナーも⸺

translation.en: I think they're gonna kill her, too.
What are you talking about? We have no idea if any of these things are connected.
translation.ja: 事件が全部 つながっていると？

translation.en: We need to get her out.
And might I reiterate, she does not want you involved.
translation.ja: 彼女は君に関わりたくないと

translation.en: Do it now. And I'll call you tonight.
translation.ja: 釈放を　後で電話します

translation.en: [man] People question the value of enhanced interrogation techniques.
translation.ja: 最近 強化尋問法が 論議の的になってる

translation.en: But torture, on the other hand, works very well.
translation.ja: 昔ながらの“拷問”は 効果絶大だ

translation.en: Attorney-client privilege goes back to the earliest days of English Common Law.
translation.ja: 弁護官と依頼人の会話には 守秘特権がある

translation.en: It means that Major Turner told you in confidence
translation.ja: あんたはターナーから 多くを聞いてるはずだ

translation.en: a great deal about what she learned from her investigation in Afghanistan.
translation.ja: アフガンから どういう情報を 入手したのか

translation.en: How much did you tell Jack Reacher?
Ten minutes is a very long time,
as you are about to learn.
Colonel Morgan was wondering if you had a few minutes.
You don't remember me, do you?
Nah. You were still C.O. when I got here. Held back my promotion for six months.
translation.ja: 配属当時 あんたが指揮官で 俺の昇級が半年 遅れた

translation.en: 'Cause you were a hard-ass prick who said I jumped to conclusions.
translation.ja: 俺が“結論を急ぎすぎる”と

translation.en: I'm sure I jumped to conclusions.
translation.ja: 俺も その欠点がある

translation.en: You're under no obligation to say anything, Major.
translation.ja: 少佐　答えなくてもいい

translation.en: Upon leaving yesterday, did you attempt to contact Major Turner?
translation.ja: 昨日 ターナーに接触したか？

translation.en: Did you confront her attorney, Colonel Moorcroft, at Fort Dyer at 1100?
translation.ja: じゃ ダイヤー基地で モアクロフト弁護官に？

translation.en: You told me not to say anything.
I said you didn't have to say anything.
Yes, I understand I don't have to say anything.
For the record, you did confront Colonel Moorcroft yesterday.
translation.ja: 君は モアクロフトに会ってる

translation.en: Can you state your whereabouts last night between 0130 and 0500?
translation.ja: 昨夜 01:30～05:00の アリバイが？

translation.en: Yes, I understand I don't have to say anything.
translation.ja: 黙秘権理解のイエスだ

translation.en: Note for the record, the Major has an injury to his hand not present during yesterday's meeting.
translation.ja: 記録しよう“少佐の手に 昨日なかった傷がある”

translation.en: At approximately 0230 this morning, Colonel Archibald Moorcroft was beaten to death.
translation.ja: モアクロフト大佐は今朝 02:30に殴り殺された

translation.en: Lieutenant Sullivan. How do you do?
translation.ja: サリバン中尉です　よろしく

translation.en: You are hereby charged with the murder of a Judge Advocate General...
translation.ja: モアクロフト法務部長の 殺害容疑だ
犯行現場は？ 自宅だ

translation.en: This is a civilian matter. As a private citizen, the Army has no jurisdiction. Turn me over to the D.C. police.
translation.ja: じゃ 軍は関係ない 民間人は警察に引き渡せ

translation.en: You're familiar with Article 10.75 of the Military Code?
translation.ja: 軍法10条75項を知らんのか？

translation.en: An officer with your security clearance remains subject to recall in event of emergency.
translation.ja: 君レベルの軍人は 緊急時に軍に召還される

translation.en: You agreed to it when you signed your discharge.
Welcome back to the Army, Major.
I'll file for disclosure. They'll turn over whatever evidence they have on you.
translation.ja: 訴追側に証拠開示を求めます

translation.en: [Lieutenant Sullivan] What are you talking about?
They killed her investigators, they killed her lawyer.
translation.ja: 弁護官を殺(や)ったのは奴らだ

translation.en: [Lieutenant Sullivan] Evidence suggests you killed Major Turner's lawyer.
translation.ja: 証拠からは あなたよ

translation.en: They're gonna kill her, then they're gonna kill me. For all I know, you're part of it.
translation.ja: ターナーと俺も消される 君も一味か？

translation.en: Hey, listen, dickhead. You're the one accused of murder.
translation.ja: 殺人容疑者が何をホザくの

translation.en: You wanna show me a shred of evidence, I'll defend you till kingdom come. Otherwise, go to hell.
translation.ja: 無罪なら全力で弁護する でなきゃ 地獄に堕ちて

translation.en: I apologize. I think I have low blood sugar.
translation.ja: 謝る　血糖値のせいだ
何て？ 朝飯抜きで目が回る

translation.en: Could you get me something from the officers' mess? Sandwich, maybe.
translation.ja: サンドイッチでも もらえる？

translation.en: Ma'am, these men are here to transfer you.
translation.ja: 移動していただきます

translation.en: [Turner] I asked you a question. Who are they?
translation.ja: 答えて　この男たちは何者？

translation.en: These men are here to kill you.
-They killed Moorcroft. -Wait, what? Last night, in his apartment. And now they're gonna kill you.
translation.ja: 昨夜 モアクロフトを殺し 君を殺しに来た

translation.en: Soldier! You know who I am!
I need you to stand down!
You've been relieved of command, ma'am.
I'm being held here without cause. It is your right to counter...
translation.ja: 理由もなく私を拘束した

translation.en: That soldier was under my command!
We don't have time for this.
Get his badge and his papers.
I left explicit orders for you to stay away.
I knew you'd do something like this.
Espin? What'd you do to him?
-This is insane. -Does this mean dinner's off?
translation.ja: 正気なの？ デートはキャンセル？
怒れよ カンカンよ

translation.en: [Turner] His keys! Give me his keys!
What kind of car would my lawyer be driving?
They're in the food truck! Stop that truck! Go, go, go, go!
translation.ja: あのトラックだ！ 追いかけろ！　逃がすな！

translation.en: [lead MP] Get them out of that truck!
So now I'm a fugitive from justice.
And a traitor to your country, don't forget that.
Why do I feel like you're enjoying this?
translation.ja: あなた 楽しんでるの？

translation.en: You have a very interesting way of saying thank you.
Were those men really going to kill me?
X.O. One of our vehicles has been hijacked. L67.
All units. Suspects traveling. MP vehicle L67.
translation.ja: 容疑者を追え　Ｌ67で逃亡中

translation.en: Primary is Jack Reacher. White. Male. 40s. Considered armed and dangerous.
translation.ja: ジャック･リーチャー 40代の白人男性　銃を所持

translation.en: Secondary is Major Susan Turner. Female. Wearing military fatigues.
translation.ja: スーザン･ターナー 女性　陸軍作業服

translation.en: [Turner] We need to ditch this car and get into my email.
translation.ja: 車を捨て メール確認を

translation.en: All right, people, let's go, let's go! Where the hell are they?
translation.ja: どうした　奴らは どこだ？

translation.en: Specialist, have the State Troopers called back yet?
On it, sir. All right, has anybody heard from the Capitol Police? Anybody? Anything? A location? Something?
translation.ja: ＤＣ警察からは？ 何でもいい　何もないのか？

translation.en: Is there still an Internet cafe around here?
translation.ja: 近所にネットカフェが？

translation.en: I should have gone to Afghanistan myself.
translation.ja: 私がアフガンに行ってれば…

translation.en: Mirkovich and Cibelli were my responsibility.
translation.ja: 部下を２人 死なせた

translation.en: The job is about giving orders.
translation.ja: 命令を下すのが上官だ

translation.en: You ever lose anyone on your watch, Reacher?
My men weren't killed by the Taliban.
They were shot, in the back of the head, with slugs from an Army-issued 9 mm.
translation.ja: タリバンでなく 後頭部を 米軍の９mm銃で撃たれた

translation.en: I'm gonna find out who did it.
What were your guys doing over there? What were they looking for?
Thousands of weapons, decommissioned during the drawdown. Whole plane load's gone missing.
translation.ja: アフガン撤退の時 大量の武器が消えたの

translation.en: Hey, I like your hat. You a Nats fan?
translation.ja: そのキャップ… “ナショナルズ”のファン？

translation.en: They arrested me the day after my investigators were killed.
translation.ja: ２人が殺されて 私の逮捕は翌日

translation.en: With the time difference, they might have filed another report.
translation.ja: 時差があるから 最後の報告を…

translation.en: They locked me up so I wouldn't see it.
Sir, she's trying to access the system.
translation.ja: 彼女がアクセスしてます
場所は？ ノース･ストリートの角です
ノース･ストリートの角です

translation.en: [Morgan] It's Morgan. Ready to go to work, soldier?
translation.ja: モーガンだ　準備はいいか？

translation.en: We've located them. They're at an Internet cafe, Pennsylvania and North Street.
translation.ja: ２人はノース･ストリートの 角のネットカフェだ

translation.en: [Turner] Whatever Mirkovich and Cibelli found out got them killed. But by who?
translation.ja: ２人はアフガンで 何かを知り 殺された
“アクセス拒否” 拒否された

translation.en: They're gonna triangulate this I.P. address.
I know. Just give me a second. Okay?
-They will know this location. -Let me try one last thing.
[Turner] There's a bus stop on the other side of the park.
We're being followed. It's not a cop.
translation.ja: 尾行されてる　デカじゃない
見つかった かもな

translation.en: We're meeting someone in the back.
Sir, I said drop your weapon.
Sir, I need you to drop your weapon.
Listen, I know what this looks like. [officer] Sir, turn around and let me see your hands!
translation.ja: 手を上げて　向こうを向け

translation.en: I'm putting my weapon down. Listen to me.
I'm military police. These two are fugitives of the United States Army.
translation.ja: 俺はＭＰで そいつらは逃亡者だ
よし　こっちを向く

translation.en: Place your hands behind your head. Now!
My identification's in my right front pocket. Will you just check it?
translation.ja: 右ポケットにＩＤが入ってる

translation.en: You know, I admit to being a little jealous when we talk.
translation.ja: 正直 あなたが羨ましい

translation.en: Nobody telling you what to do or how to do it.
It's definitely not the Army way.
Let's take a look at that registration.
[Turner] Parasource? You think that guy in the kitchen was one of theirs?
translation.ja: “パラソース” あの男も一味かしら
今 リーチャーの軍歴を…

translation.en: You have no idea. They ran out of medals.
translation.ja: あらゆる勲章を掻(か)っさらった

translation.en: So don't make this a competition.
Sure you can handle him by yourself?
I can handle him just fine.
translation.ja: それは ご心配なく
コーヒーだ ミルクは？

translation.en: I spent the rest of our cash.
It's time we stopped running and start hunting.
translation.ja: これからは逃げずに 追う

translation.en: [Reacher] Catch you at a bad time?
I hope you're calling to turn yourselves in.
I don't know your role in this yet, Colonel. I'm guessing money. I promise you I will find out.
translation.ja: 金に釣られたのだろうが 必ず真相を暴く

translation.en: Not even in Major Turner's email?
translation.ja: ターナーのメールには？

translation.en: Why don't we check my field reports?
I will snap the tendon before it breaks the bone. It takes longer to heal.
translation.ja: 骨をへシ折る前に腱(けん)を切る 治らないぞ

translation.en: Mirkovich and Cibelli's field reports. What else you got on here, huh?
translation.ja: アフガンの２人からの報告よ 他には？

translation.en: But there are ways to get at you, Reacher.
translation.ja: 吠え面(づら)をかかせる

translation.en: Thanks for all your help, Colonel.
Okay. Mirkovich and Cibelli did file a final report.
translation.ja: やはり最後の報告が入ってた

translation.en: Okay, here we go. The last man they spoke to was a contractor named Daniel Prudhomme.
translation.ja: ２人が最後に接触したのは 請負会社のＤ･プルドム

translation.en: He oversaw weapons transports. Said he was evasive then he disappeared.
translation.ja: 武器輸送の管理役で 姿を隠し“行方不明”

translation.en: This is Sergeant Greene, your old D.I. Remember me?
Sergeant Greene. So good to hear from you.
translation.ja: グリーン軍曹 お元気ですか？

translation.en: [Reacher] I'm here with a friend of yours. We need a favor.
There's a military contractor called Parasource. Think you could ask around, find out what role they played in Bagram?
translation.ja: 軍事会社パラソースと アフガンの米軍基地との関連を

translation.en: I might be able to do that.
Also there's a Parasource employee named Prudhomme. We need his whereabouts.
translation.ja: 雇用されてた プルドムという男の所在も
プルドムですね　了解

translation.en: -Let go of me! Let go! -Hey, hey, hey!
translation.ja: やめて！　手を放して！

translation.en: I don't understand. You said you're not a cop.
I left it in the apartment where you kidnapped me.
There are people out there who want to hurt you.
translation.ja: 君を狙ってる奴らがいる

translation.en: Just put your head out the window.
Hey, when was the last time you had something to eat?
-I don't know. -We need to get her some food.
How long have you been drawing?
Beth and Herb were these two nice old hippies. Who'd want to kill them?
translation.ja: ベスとハーブは いい人たちよ 誰が２人を…

translation.en: You've had a shock. Your body's pumping adrenaline. Cortisol. They call it fight or flight.
translation.ja: 君はショックを受け ホルモンのバランスが崩れてる

translation.en: It's gonna take a while to calm down.
I can't eat. I'm pumping adrenaline.
translation.ja: 要らない　ホルモンのせいよ

translation.en: I know a place she'll be safe.
I'm not going to a stupid school.
They have a dress code. This is what they wear there.
I know the headmistress. You'll be safe there.

translation.ja: “女性校長”？ そこ 修道院？

translation.en: Do you want to live? Do you?
translation.ja: 死にたくないだろ？ どうだ？

translation.en: Then you will go where we say and stay until we say it's safe.
translation.ja: じゃ 言われたとおりにしろ 死なないで済む

translation.en: You're very intense. You know that?
-What are you doing here? -Reacher has the girl.
You were supposed to take care of that.
You people. You take off the uniform and lose all discipline.
translation.ja: 軍服を脱ぐと ただの能なしか
知るか 奴は今日 ここに現れた

translation.en: When he was here, earlier today.
translation.ja: 奴は今日 ここに現れた

translation.en: You're watching me now? Who the hell do you think you are?
translation.ja: 貴様 俺を見張ってたのか？
奴に⸺ 何を⸺ 教えた？

translation.en: I don't have to be interrogated by the likes of you.
He came in here with that bitch and threatened me. I gave him nothing.
translation.ja: あの女と現れたが 何も話してない

translation.en: We hired you to clean up this mess.
He touched this phone, didn't he?
That means his prints are on it. Huh?
[Turner] I mean, really, if I had any other choice... It should only be for a few days.
translation.ja: 無理をお願いしてすみません ほんの数日です

translation.en: You know how we feel about you here at Pembroke, Susan.
translation.ja: 優秀な卒業生のためなら

translation.en: -It's so nice to see you. -It's good to see you, too...
translation.ja: 元気そうね 先生も

translation.en: Show me what you feel. You are not a camera.
translation.ja: 感じたままに　写真じゃない

translation.en: What do you feel about these hands?
translation.ja: あの手から何を感じる？

translation.en: Are these nurturing hands? Have they held children? Do they carry pain? Why do we draw?
translation.ja: 子供を抱いた愛情を 感じる手か　苦痛の残る手か

translation.en: Welcome to Pembroke. Hi, I'm Olivia.
[May] Ooh, travel's really good for college applications.
[Olivia] Have you taken the PSATs yet?
[May] You need to sign up right away.
[girl] May! Oh, my God, your earrings! Where'd you get them?
translation.ja: そのイヤリング すてき！

translation.en: Oh, thank you. Actually, my dad brought them back from New York.
Ah! My parents promised me some intense retail therapy when we're in Paris for Christmas.
translation.ja: 私はパリで クリスマス･ショッピングよ

translation.en: Wow, Paris. You guys have been everywhere.
It's beautiful. I've been three times. Have you ever been?
translation.ja: いい街よ　３度も行ったわ

translation.en: -It's great. The Eiffel Tower. -[May] Have you been in it?
translation.ja: エッフェル塔にも 行ったの？

translation.en: [May] You guys are doing a lot of traveling. -It's awesome. -[cell phone buzzes]
translation.ja: 羨ましいファミリーね

translation.en: I'll probably stick around at home. The usual.
translation.ja: 今年も家で冬休みだわ

translation.en: I don't want you to worry.
You said you didn't have a phone. How many times did you use this?
translation.ja: 携帯を持ってたのか？ 何度かけた？

translation.en: It was nothing. Just one person.
-Excuse me. We have to go. Thank you. -It was nothing.
translation.ja: せっかくですが失礼します

translation.en: Nance, give me one second. Hey!
translation.ja: 失礼 待って　どうしたの？

translation.en: Hey, what the hell is going on?
translation.ja: 待って　どうしたの？

translation.en: -What's wrong with that? -One, they can trace us.
translation.ja: だから？ 探知される
あの学校 バカみたい

translation.en: Some of their boys got into trouble in Afghanistan.
They lost some big government contracts. Word is they're in financial trouble.
translation.ja: 政府の契約を失って 経営難でした

translation.en: Why does he get to have a phone?
-This Daniel Prudhomme... -Hold on. You need to be quiet.

translation.ja: それで？　プルドムの話を

translation.en: The contractor our guys talked to, he lives in New Orleans.
translation.ja: アフガンで ターナーの部下が尋問

translation.en: He disappeared right after he was interrogated. Hitched a ride back home to his wife and kids.
translation.ja: その直後 彼は姿を隠し ニューオーリンズの家族の元へ

translation.en: New Orleans is Parasource's home base.
translation.ja: パラソースの本社があり⸺

translation.en: They know he's back and they're looking for him.

translation.ja: ニューオーリンズへ行く

translation.en: Your prints were found on the murder weapon.
translation.ja: 凶器に あなたの指紋が

translation.en: We need to find Prudhomme before Parasource gets a hold of him.
translation.ja: プルドムを捜さないと
クレジットカードは？ ＩＤもね

translation.en: "Daddy is so happy with my SATs "and extracurricular activities,
translation.ja: “統一テストの点数がよくて パパからの ご褒美なの”

translation.en: "he's takin' us all to New Orleans."
Unless you want me to shut up.
[woman] If you're seated in an emergency exit row, please review the responsibilities for emergency exit seating
translation.ja: 非常口の横の席の方は 緊急の際 ご協力を

translation.en: on the back of the safety information card located in the seat pocket in front of you.
translation.ja: パンフレットを お読みください

translation.en: I don't want you puking on me.
So, how long have you been in the Army for?
So, if you give a guy orders, he has to obey.
translation.ja: なら⸺ あなたが命令を下すと 部下は何も言わずに従う
あなたが命令を下すと 部下は何も言わずに従う

translation.en: And if he tries messing with you, you know, like, all kinds of moves, right?
translation.ja: 部下が盾突いたら 痛い思いをさせる

translation.en: Are you gay? I mean, it's totally cool. I know tons of lesbians.
translation.ja: 同性愛なの？ 私は偏見ないわよ

translation.en: I thought all lady soldiers are gay.
translation.ja: 女兵士は そうかと

translation.en: Well, some are, some aren't. Like out in the real world.
translation.ja: そういう人も… 他の世界と同じよ
それで… リーチャーは⸺
セックス友達？ 違う

translation.en: You mean no, you don't want to,
translation.ja: あなたが望まないのか

translation.en: or no, he doesn't want to, or no, not yet, you guys haven't really...
translation.ja: 彼が望まないのか どっち？

translation.en: All right. I see how it is.
He left before I was born.
Just says he was a big hero and a total asshole.
translation.ja: “英雄だったけど クソ野郎”と

translation.en: [flight attendant] We're beginning our descent, so if you need to stretch your legs or use the lavatories, you should do it now.
translation.ja: 下降を始めます 化粧室は今のうちに

translation.en: It's the haircut. All you contractors go to the same barber?
translation.ja: 君らは髪形が同じ 決まった散髪屋か？

translation.en: Oh, he's not feeling well. You might want to use this one.
translation.ja: 飛行機酔いらしい　そっちへ

translation.en: Took two more of your pieces off the board.
translation.ja: 手下を２人 片づけた

translation.en: What were you? JSOC? SEAL Team?
I'm not sure I ever did.
People like us, we can never go back to the world.
translation.ja: お前も俺も シャバには戻れない人間だ

translation.en: And the people around us get hurt.
Walk away now and I won't hurt the little girl.
translation.ja: 渡せば ガキに手は出さん

translation.en: [announcer over PA] Welcome to Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport.
translation.ja: ニューオーリンズ国際空港に ようこそ

translation.en: Now, you're gonna tell me what's going on,
translation.ja: どういうことか話して

translation.en: or the first chance I get, I'm gonna scream or grab a policeman.
translation.ja: 叫ぶか 警官を呼ぶわよ

translation.en: -I found out that some... -Look, you don't...
Some people were stealing from the government.
At this point, the less you know, the better.
Bullshit! I got us the credit card, okay?
translation.ja: バカにしないで！ 誰のカードで 飛行機に乗ったの？

translation.en: We wouldn't have gotten on that plane without it.
translation.ja: 誰のカードで 飛行機に乗ったの？

translation.en: Well, why would you think you are?
translation.ja: 自分でも そう思う？

translation.en: Because your mother filed a paternity suit with the Army claiming I was.
translation.ja: 君の母親が軍に申し立てた

translation.en: All we have available is a lovely two-bedroom suite, $350 a night. Will that do?
translation.ja: ２ベッドルームの お部屋なら 350ドルで ご用意できます

translation.en: [Turner] Yes. Can I pay in cash?
So, we gonna take a DNA test?
I got to tell you something.
This whole thing is my fault.
I was the one who made her file the paternity thing.
translation.ja: ママが その申し立てを したのは⸺

translation.en: I thought maybe she could get something out of it.
Help her get her life together.
She's doing better since she got out.
translation.ja: 釈放後 ママは立ち直り⸺

translation.en: Maybe she could get a little house.
translation.ja: いずれ マイホームも…

translation.en: I can see it in your face.
Yes, you are. They think I'm your kid, so you have to worry about protecting me.
translation.ja: 怒ってるわ 私が娘だから守らねばと

translation.en: So I don't want to be here. So you don't want me here. So I should just leave.
translation.ja: 面倒な娘は消えた方がいい
シャンパンも冷やした

translation.en: I knew you were the romantic type.
So, Reacher, after those phone calls,
what exactly did you think would happen?
I thought a nice dinner, maybe some wine.
translation.ja: 食事に誘おうかなと ワイン付きで
それで… 食事の後は？

translation.en: As opposed to your seedy motel?
translation.ja: ショボいモーテルでなく？

translation.en: Never underestimate the charm of a seedy motel.
translation.ja: ショボいのも悪くないよ

translation.en: What do you say we look for a seedy motel once I find Prudhomme?
translation.ja: それはプルドムを 見つけてからだ

translation.en: Only one of us should go.
No, someone needs to stay here with her.
What, because I'm a woman I should be the babysitter?
translation.ja: 女だから 私が子守をするわけ？

translation.en: I don't know how to be the babysitter.
[scoffs] You know, I've had to put up with this crap my entire career.
Forget the dickheads who think that they can paw me, -it's every male officer... -Hey, hey, excuse me.
translation.ja: 男って女に迫っておいて 蔑視する！

translation.en: ...who thinks that he's smarter and tougher...
translation.ja: 男って女に迫っておいて 蔑視する！ 君は免職処置を受け 軍を脱走した士官だぞ

translation.en: You've been relieved of command. I am the commanding officer here! You are a fugitive from military justice.
translation.ja: 君は免職処置を受け 軍を脱走した士官だぞ

translation.en: Look, I told you people I don't know where he is, okay?
translation.ja: 言ったでしょ？ 居所は知りません

translation.en: -He's done with all of that. -It's for his own protection.
translation.ja: もう関係ない ご主人を⸺

translation.en: Yeah, well, he needs all the help he can get, that's for damn sure.
translation.ja: そうね　今のあの人には あらゆる助けが必要よ

translation.en: Does he have any friends? Places?
Any place there's dope is where.
You can burn it for all I care.
And you didn't think we were watching the wife.
translation.ja: あの女房を見張ってた

translation.en: So how do you want to do this?
How about one at a time? I get a baseball bat.
translation.ja: 野球バットで １人ずつ片づける

translation.en: Really? If you were gonna kill me, you would have done it by now.
translation.ja: 俺を殺るなら チャンスがあっただろ？

translation.en: Oh, we're not gonna kill you. Not until you beg for it.
translation.ja: 殺してくれと言うまで待つ
左ひざか　右ひざか

translation.en: Turner's gonna call me in two minutes.
translation.ja: ターナーの電話が入る

translation.en: If I don't answer, if I don't pick up, if I sound distressed,
translation.ja: 俺が出なきゃ 異変を察知 彼女は⸺

translation.en: And now you're wondering how you're gonna make me talk without tipping her off.
You can't torture me. You can't kill me.
translation.ja: 拷問はできないし 殺せない

translation.en: And you're definitely gonna have to kill me.
I told you people, I don't like being followed.
translation.ja: 言ったろ？　俺を尾けるなと

translation.en: Killing you isn't gonna be enough, though. So I'm gonna take back my promise about not hurting the little girl.
translation.ja: あの娘に手を出さないという 約束は取り消しだ
やれるさ 学校から⸺

translation.en: she'll be walking home from school
or she'll be out on a date
or hanging out with her friends.
And you won't be there to protect her.
translation.ja: その時 何が起こっても お前は そこにいない

translation.en: Okay, so let's try it again. This time I want you to take the gun and hold it lower on your chest, okay?
translation.ja: もう一度よ　銃を奪い 胸に抱え込む

translation.en: You're holding it a bit too high.
Yeah, bring it low. That's right. Now step out and rotate.
translation.ja: 抜け出して 離れる
リーチャー　見てて

translation.en: Well, trust me, if all you have left is that move, just assume you're dead already.
translation.ja: そんな動きじゃ とっくに殺されてる

translation.en: That was good. Let's try again. We're gonna add a kick to the balls into it, okay?
translation.ja: いいから今度はタマを 蹴り上げて

translation.en: Welcome to New Orleans, Captain. I'm Lieutenant Decoudreau. We're here to help any way we can.
translation.ja: ようこそ　大尉 ドクルドロー中尉です

translation.en: What do you have for me?
Guys on the plane were ex-military. Beat up pretty bad.
translation.ja: 機内で殴られた２人は元軍人

translation.en: Do we know who they're working for?
I want their bank records, service records, foreign travel,
translation.ja: 預金高　軍歴　旅行歴

translation.en: how they like their eggs, their favorite flavor of ice cream. And I want it yesterday.
translation.ja: 好きなアイスの味まで 全部 調べろ

translation.en: She didn't know where he was.
But she gave me a photo.
Are you more upset that I treated you like a woman or that I treated you like a man?
translation.ja: 女扱いが気に障(さわ)ったか？ 男並みに扱おうか？

translation.en: [sighs] I'm upset that I didn't deck you.
I should have been the one to go talk to her. I can handle myself. I would've done better.
translation.ja: 私が行ってれば もっと うまくやってた

translation.en: Is it really so important that you make every decision?
translation.ja: それほど主導権が欲しいか

translation.en: Oh, God, you're such a dick.
What do you think we should do?
-Don't patronize me, okay? -I'm asking your opinion.
translation.ja: 急に何よ 意見を聞いてるんだ

translation.en: Well, we could go to the V.A.
Which is the first place Parasource will look.
How about the local MPs then?
Who'll arrest us in a heartbeat.
Okay, what is your plan then, Reacher?
See, you don't know what to do.
You're like something feral. You've got their scent in your nose and all you want is blood.
translation.ja: あなたは獣のように 血の匂いを追うだけ

translation.en: You still don't get it, do you?
They killed my men, took away my job, my life!
translation.ja: 部下を殺され キャリアを失った

translation.en: I don't want them as bad as you, I want them more.
translation.ja: あなたより奴らを憎んでる

translation.en: Could you go see if she's up? We should get some breakfast, figure out our next move.
translation.ja: 彼女 起きた？ 食事して 計画を立てないと

translation.en: -What do we do with the kid? -The kid has a name.
translation.ja: 手のかかる子だ 名前があるのよ

translation.en: Why are you so tough on her?
The sooner she knows it, the better.
You don't think she knows that already?
Reacher, what if she is yours?
Then I should have been there 15 years ago.
Did she say anything to you?
-I was trying to help. -How were you gonna help, huh?
You guys said Prudhomme's a junkie.
-We never told you... -I heard you guys talking.
Some dude on the street said there's a place in the Ninth Ward where homeless vets hang out.
translation.ja: ホームレスの元兵隊が 何人か廃倉庫に⸺

translation.en: People talk to me. It's a thing.
translation.ja: 聞き出すのは得意なの

translation.en: Do you have any idea how dangerous that was?
I told you I can take care of myself.
Fifteen years old, people are looking for you, okay.
When things get hairy, I just pick out the alpha guy.
And what, he's supposed to protect you?
Strong guys don't hurt you. The weak guys do that.
translation.ja: 強い男って優しいから

translation.en: Strong guys always have little sisters.
Or they want one. I don't know why, that's just how it is.
translation.ja: なぜか妹を欲しいと 思ってるの

translation.en: Please don't ever do that again.
translation.ja: もう二度と やるな

translation.en: Excuse me, sir. Can you look at this picture, please?
translation.ja: “リハビリ相談” この写真を見てくれる？ この写真を見てくれる？

translation.en: Well, folks call it the ninth circle of hell. If he's a vet, that's where he's gonna be.
translation.ja: 元兵隊なら たぶん向こうの “第９の地獄”だろう

translation.en: [junkie] What do you want with him?
[Reacher] I told you. I want to give him money.
Now, you spoke to two MPs.
No. No, I never heard of them.

translation.ja: ミルコビッチには娘が

translation.en: Cibelli's wife is pregnant with their first.
translation.ja: チベッリの奥さんは妊娠中

translation.en: Now, you're gonna tell me what happened!
translation.ja: チベッリの奥さんは妊娠中 全部 話して

translation.en: Now, we'll protect you. But you have to tell us all of it.
translation.ja: 隠さず話したら 我々が守る

translation.en: Parasource was running truck convoys out of Bagram.
We just ran security for the base. All I had to do was just lie and say all the weapons were all accounted for.
translation.ja: トラックで運び出される 武器の数を ごまかしてた

translation.en: They gave me a shitload of money to keep my mouth shut.
translation.ja: たんまり口止め料が出た

translation.en: We're leaving enough shit over there now to start another war.
translation.ja: パラソースは ごまかした武器を⸺

translation.en: Parasource was selling off the weapons
translation.ja: 裏で現地の武装勢力に 売りさばいてた

translation.en: instead of bringing them back to the States.
translation.ja: 裏で現地の武装勢力に 売りさばいてた 裏で現地の武装勢力に 売りさばいてた “ＡＴ４ロケット砲 ２基”

translation.en: Warlords want to renegotiate. Parasource says no.
translation.ja: 値段のことで武装勢力と パラソースが対立した

translation.en: Next day, we're driving through those poppy fields. The whole convoy just gets lit up.
translation.ja: 我々のトラック隊は ケシ畑の真ん中で攻撃を受けた

translation.en: Army had to send in a Search and Rescue. Three Search and Rescue dudes get wasted on the way.
translation.ja: 捜索救助隊が来たが ３人が命を落とした

translation.en: Two of the dudes I knew, man.
What happened after you gave your statement?
There was this guy. He worked for Parasource.
translation.ja: だがパラソースにいた男が…

translation.en: He told me not to worry, that he'd take care of everything.
translation.ja: “心配するな　任せろ”と 言い⸺

translation.en: Next thing I know, I hear they've been killed.
translation.ja: 次の瞬間 ２人を撃ち殺した

translation.en: I hitched a ride back to the States.
translation.ja: 故国(くに)に逃げ帰った

translation.en: I was a dead man if I stayed.
I started shooting up over there.
I figured if I'd just get myself home, you know, I...
translation.ja: 無事 故国(くに)に戻れたら⸺

translation.en: More shit on the streets of New Orleans than they're making in Afghanistan.
translation.ja: ヤクの売買はアフガンより この街の方が盛んだ

translation.en: -The numbers don't add up. -What do you mean?
Why put huge government contracts at risk while selling U.S. Army weapons on the black market?
translation.ja: 武器の密売がバレたら 巨額の政府の契約を失う

translation.en: Didn't anybody check to see the crates were empty?
translation.ja: 本当に空(から)だったのか

translation.en: Probably some dumb guy like me.
translation.ja: 検査官を買収してるよ

translation.en: We need to get inside one of those transports.
Plane leaves Bagram every Friday at 0600 hours.
translation.ja: 便が出るのは 毎週金曜の06:00時

translation.en: Six hours to Frankfurt. Rest, refuel, eleven more to get home.
translation.ja: フランクフルトで給油して こっちに到着する

translation.en: [Lieutenant Decoudreau] And that was without the hot sauce.
Now, you gotta tell me that was worth it, sir.
Hey, hey, where you at, chief?
translation.ja: ねえ 遊んでかない？

translation.en: -Ooh, you know, you one fine muffaletta! -No, no, no.
translation.ja: あんたって おいしそう

translation.en: -No, thank you, ma'am. I'm good. -Wait a minute. Now, don't go depriving a poor girl a taste now.
I have no money. I don't need your services. -Not today, darling. -Okay.
-Well, it's his loss now. -Go on now.
-Do I have my wallet? -Yeah, I think you're good.
All right, I got my wallet.

translation.ja: やった？ 信用してよ

translation.en: I have a witness who can exonerate me.
But he has to live first.
Why don't you, uh... Why don't you come in? We'll talk about it.
translation.ja: 俺のオフィスで話そう

translation.en: You're not in charge anymore, Major.
Neither are you, apparently. Operatives have been ahead of you this whole time.
translation.ja: 自分も出し抜かれたくせに

translation.en: Who were those guys on the plane, hmm?
Who tried to kill me in my cell?
Here's a name for you. Parasource.
Here's a couple more names to think about... Baghdad. Basra.
translation.ja: この地名は どう？ バグダッド… バスラ…

translation.en: It's not our first rodeo, is it, Captain?
translation.ja: あなたは私と組んでた

translation.en: You think I want to be in this position, ma'am? I have a job to do, and I'm gonna do it.
translation.ja: 誤解しないでくれ 仕事だから あなたを訴追した

translation.en: I'm gonna take a leap of faith that you don't have anything to do with this.
translation.ja: あなたの潔白は信じてるわ

translation.en: Look on the back of the phone. Come alone and make sure you're not tailed.
translation.ja: 携帯の裏を見て 尾行に注意を

translation.en: [Lieutenant Decoudreau] Decoudreau to Espin. Decoudreau to Espin.
translation.ja: ドクルドローからエスピンへ

translation.en: [Lieutenant Decoudreau] We ID'ed those boys on the plane. Paid by a shell company out of the Cayman Islands.
translation.ja: 飛行機の２人を雇ったのは ペーパーカンパニーです

translation.en: We traced the bank accounts back to a big military contractor, name of...
translation.ja: 口座をたどると 親会社は…

translation.en: Never mind. Uh... Give me everything you can on Parasource, and I mean everything.
translation.ja: パラソースの情報を 洗いざらい調べろ

translation.en: Look, I'm en route to pick up a witness.
No, stand ready two minutes out. Wait for my signal.
Reacher knows the game. If he smells heat, he'll bolt.
translation.ja: 相手はリーチャーだ 鼻が利く

translation.en: [Lieutenant Decoudreau] All right, we'll stay two minutes out. What's the address?
translation.ja: 離れて待機します　住所は？
ニコルズ埠頭だ　以上

translation.en: Don't shoot! Don't shoot, man! Don't kill me. Don't kill me. [stutters] I'm here to help.
translation.ja: 撃たないでくれ！ 俺は味方だ

translation.en: -You're the witness? -Yeah. Yes, yeah, I'm the witness.
translation.ja: 証人か？ そう　俺が証人だ

translation.en: -You got what you need? -Not good enough.
I suggest you listen to what he has to say.

translation.ja: 話すよ よし　聞こう

translation.en: I like stories. Tell me a story.
[narrator on TV] Now we return to our Halloween marathon.
translation.ja: ハロウィーンの映画特集です

translation.en: Is your costume ready for tonight's parade?
translation.ja: 仮装の準備はできたかな？
応援を！　ニコルズ埠頭だ

translation.en: I'm a stone killer. That's why I saved you.
translation.ja: 仲間を助ける冷酷な殺し屋さ

translation.en: Did Prudhomme give you his statement?
Cibelli and Mirkovich were your friends.
They also just tried to kill you.
They've been providing insurgents with weapons.
You're gonna need more proof than the word of a dead junkie.
translation.ja: 死んだヤク中の証言だ

translation.en: And you're gonna help us get it.
Here. Put the cuffs on, take us into custody.
Just get us on the tarmac of Parasource in one hour.
translation.ja: １時間で パラソースの飛行場へ

translation.en: I need you to jump to a conclusion here, soldier.
translation.ja: 結論に飛びつく時だぞ

translation.en: Six months ago, Parasource loses government contracts worth over a billion dollars.
translation.ja: 半年前 政府はパラソースとの 10億ドルの契約を解消

translation.en: They're bleeding cash and the banks want blood.
But now, all of a sudden, they start paying back their creditors.
translation.ja: だが最近 金庫が潤(うるお)ったらしい

translation.en: How much money can they be really making selling weapons on the black market?
translation.ja: 武器の闇価格って どのぐらい？

translation.en: An M4 is, what, five grand?

translation.ja: ロケット砲は その半額？

translation.en: That's nothing compared to government contracts.
[Espin] So where are they getting the money?
[woman] Guest Services. How may I help you?
Hi, do you have room service?
translation.ja: ルームサービス 頼める？

translation.en: I'm sorry, I see you paid cash for your room. I'm afraid we can't provide incidentals without a credit card.
translation.ja: お部屋代が現金なので クレジットカードが必要です

translation.en: Uh, yeah, just hold on a second.
You do understand that the parade is coming and it may take a while.
translation.ja: お祭りなので 少々お時間を
急いでね　腹ペコなの

translation.en: Sir? We got a hit on one of the stolen cards.
translation.ja: 盗難カードが使われました
場所はホテル･ドーフィンです
憲兵隊のエスピン大尉よ

translation.en: I'm gonna have to call this in.
[Reacher] They're unloading the crates. We got to get in there.
Drill is we enforce the law.
translation.ja: 厳しく法を執行するの
止まれ！ 動くな　撃つぞ！

translation.en: I will lay you down, soldier boy!
Put 'em down, boys, put 'em down. Take 'em down.
translation.ja: お前たち 銃を下ろせ 銃を下ろすんだ

translation.en: You in charge of this operation?
I'm General James Harkness. I run this company.
translation.ja: ここの部隊長 ハークネス将軍だ

translation.en: We have probable cause to believe a crime has been committed.
translation.ja: 我々は犯罪を追っています
110憲兵隊の ターナー少佐です

translation.en: The Major Turner who's wanted by the MPs for espionage?
translation.ja: スパイ容疑で ＭＰが追ってる少佐か？

translation.en: [Turner] These crates are supposed to contain weapons belonging to the United States Army.
translation.ja: ここの木箱には 米陸軍の武器が入っているはず

translation.en: In fact, you sold them to insurgents. And these are now empty.
translation.ja: あなたが武装勢力に 売ったので中は空っぽです

translation.en: Do you know who I am, Major?

translation.ja: 存じております　将軍

translation.en: You're the man responsible for the deaths of two of my men.
translation.ja: 私の部下を２人 殺した方よ

translation.en: Now, open up those crates before I grab you by your hair plugs
translation.ja: 箱を開けないと そのカツラを ひっぱがし⸺

translation.en: and bitch slap that smug look off of your face.
What does the manifest say is in there?
translation.ja: 送り状にある積み荷は？
ＡＴ４ロケットランチャーです

translation.en: I said open up that crate!

translation.ja: 中尉 職務を遂行し このとんでもない女を逮捕しろ

translation.en: and place this goddamn woman under arrest.
translation.ja: 職務を遂行し このとんでもない女を逮捕しろ

translation.en: Sorry, Major, you're gonna need to come with me.
translation.ja: すみません　少佐 ご同行を

translation.en: You're right. The numbers don't add up.
translation.ja: 君の言うとおり 何かがヘンだ

translation.en: Good evening. I'm looking for a man,
a woman and a little blonde teenager.
translation.ja: 金髪のティーンエイジャーが 一緒だ

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I don't think I can help you with that type of information.
translation.ja: すみません そういう質問は…

translation.en: I'm looking for two adults and a little blonde girl.
translation.ja: 男女のカップルと金髪の娘だ

translation.en: [FBI agent] We have a 4-star general in custody. And it's at least 500 kilos.
translation.ja: 将軍を逮捕 押収アヘンは500キロ

translation.en: Where are you going? Come back here!

translation.ja: 部屋じゃない　表だ

translation.en: -She's in the street. -How do you know?
translation.ja: 部屋じゃない　表だ 通りへ？

translation.en: Because that's what I would do.
Searched the whole hotel. We didn't find a trace of her.
Let's finish this. Just you and me.
I'm gonna have some fun with your pretty little girl.
translation.ja: お前の かわいい娘と楽しむ

translation.en: Is that fear I hear in your voice, Jack?
I'm gonna break your arms, I'm gonna break your legs. I'm gonna break your neck.
translation.ja: その腕を折り 脚を折り その首を折ってやる

translation.en: [man] Hey, you! Get out of there!
I've found a way to hurt you like you've never hurt before.
translation.ja: あの娘が お前の弱みだ
いたか？ ラフィット･ホテルよ

translation.en: Shoot me and I let go!
Parasource is done. Harkness is in custody.
translation.ja: パラソースは崩壊 将軍は逮捕された

translation.en: Congratulations, Jack. I really... I don't give a shit.
translation.ja: よかったな 俺には関係ないぜ

translation.en: I told you this would happen.
You said this was about you and me.
If I put down the gun, you let her go.
translation.ja: 銃を置くから 娘を放せ

translation.en: It's okay, Sam. Look at me.
It's okay. It's the only way.
translation.ja: いいんだ　これしかない

translation.en: I'm gonna put the gun down now.
-[Samantha] Is he all right? -Yeah, I think so.
translation.ja: 大丈夫？ ええ　目で追って

translation.en: [Samantha] Dude, you jumped off a building!
Did you see how high that was?
Can we possibly have this conversation some other time?
translation.ja: 話の続きは後にしよう

translation.en: You came here looking for one girl and you ended up with another.
translation.ja: 私でなく サムとの絆ができた

translation.en: Let me know how that goes.
Good to see you back, Major.
Sorry. Bus got stuck in traffic.
translation.ja: ごめん　道が込んでて…

translation.en: are you my father or not?
I guess we'll see when your mother gets here.
I tend to remember the women I sleep with.
translation.ja: 一度 寝た女は覚えてる

translation.en: But who says she'll remember you?
The waitress who's refilled your coffee three times?
translation.ja: ３度 コーヒーを注ぎ足した

translation.en: Neither of you had any idea who the other was.
translation.ja: どっちも反応しなかった

translation.en: -I knew it all along. -[Reacher] No, you didn't.
translation.ja: 違うと思ってた どうだか

translation.en: You can call me when you do.
translation.ja: そういう時は電話して

translation.en: Yeah, well, you keep that up, because you're really good at it.
translation.ja: 続けるといい 才能がある
